review: Great location besides Kosi River. The staff is very friendly and helpfull and the kitchen cooks good and tasty dishes. The rooms are spotless and beautifully furnished. Big and comfortable beds - you sleep like dream. Enjoy sunrise and sunset on private balcony or common terrace. Hot water in shower at all times.  Go for a hike or a mountainbike ride in the surrounding area - staff will help you.
name: Martin J

review: Very helpfull and serviceminded staff. Excellent food which is included. The staff can arrange guided walkings and mountainbiking tours in the sorroundings. A very quiet place also for relaxing. There is a lot of birds around and if you are lucky, you will get a glimpse of a leopard. The rooms are very modern and comfortable with shower and toilet.
name: Lena R
